title: Journal of Alternative Complementary & Integrative Medicine
description: Journal of Alternative, Complementary and Integrative Medicine (ISSN 2470-7562) is indexed in Google Scholar, DOI and J-Gate. Publishing articles related to fields of healing, therapy and Alternative, Complementary and Integrative Medicine research.
cleaned_text: [ 5113](http://www.sindexs.org/JournalList.aspx?ID=5113), [ Web of Science](https://publons.com/journal/35890/journal-of-alternative-complementary-integrative-m/) Journal of Alternative, Complementary & Integrative Medicine is an international open access peer reviewed online journal with the ISSN: 2470-7562. Alternative, Complementary and Integrative Medicine, these approaches are currently riding the crest of public enthusiasm. Clinical and translational research in this arena has proven that a myriad of conventional therapies provide benefit for many disorders that ail us. Unhealthy lifestyle choices bring forth the physical and psychological problems. To treat and cure the human ailments and diseases with utmost care, therapists and healers believe the ancient ideas for the better results. Alternative, complementary and integrative therapies are the non main stream practices of today's treatments for the health care either within the place of, or together with the conventional medicine and by the personalized spiritual and emotional healthcare. Journal of Alternative, Complementary & Integrative Medicine is one of the best publishing forums for the healers, therapists, researchers and scholars to present their work. Journal publishes articles on the practical approaches and different healing methods of the therapists and healers which help for the advancement in the treatment. Journal aims to disseminate these different healing methods globally. Hence the periodicals of this journal are indexed in Directory of Research Journals Indexing (DRJI), Google scholar, Scientific Indexing Services (SIS), J-Gate and also members of Crossref, ORCID and publons. Readers can access and download the articles freely. Accessing and downloading the articles will increase the journal impact factor, as the impact factor is the evaluating factor for the journal quality. Impact Factor for Journal: 1.1* *2021 Journal Impact Factor was established by dividing the number of articles published in 2020 and 2019 with the number of times they are cited in 2020 and 2019 based on Google Scholar Citation Index database. If 'X' is the total number of articles published in 2020 and 2019, and 'Y' is the number of times these articles were cited in indexed journals during 2020 and 2019 then, journal impact factor = Y/X Wide arena of the Journal includes: Alternative Japanese Herbal to natural medicine; Practical approach for creating and expanding a holistic practice; Clinical applications of Alternative, Complementary medicine therapies; Cognitive Behavioral Therapy; Traditional Medicine for COVID-19; Dietary Supplements; Plants Chen, Ziyun Starchenko M
